webui.tfile

Details

This module defines some useful helper functions for implementing a TADS game with a Web-based user interface.

generateRandomKey processNetRequests

Global Functions  

generateRandomKey ( )

webui.t[360]

Generate a random key. This returns a 128-bit random number as a hex string. This is designed for ephemeral identifiers, such as session keys.

processNetRequests (doneFunc, timeout?)

webui.t[1493]

Process network requests. Continues until doneFunc() returns true, or a timeout or error occurs. If we return because doneFunc() returned true, we’ll return nil. Otherwise, we’ll return the NetEvent that terminated the wait. TADS 3 Library Manual
